item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，私募股权公司 GTCR 达成 48 亿美元收购 Zentiva 的交易
item.description: 据《金融时报》周三援引未具名消息人士的话报道，私募股权公司 GTCR 已达成一项 41 亿欧元（48 亿美元）的交易，从 Advent International 手中收购捷克仿制药制造商 Zentiva。【原文：Private equity firm GTCR has struck a 4.1 billion euro ($4.8 billion) deal to buy Czech generic drugmaker Zentiva from Advent International, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday, citing unidentified sources.】

item.title: 日本和台湾股市因科技股提振和美联储减息希望而刷新纪录
item.description: 日本和台湾股市周四创下历史新高，科技公司股价大涨，投资者押注美国通胀数据将表现良好，足以确保下周降息，年底前可能还会有两次降息。【原文：Japanese and Taiwanese shares set records on Thursday as technology companies rallied while investors wagered that U.S. inflation data will be well behaved enough to ensure an interest rate cut next week, and perhaps two more by year end.】

item.title: 美国需求疲软，经济走软，油价持平
item.description: 周四油价持平，较前一交易日有所降温，原因是美国需求疲软和广泛的供应过剩风险消除了对中东袭击和俄罗斯乌克兰战争的担忧。【原文：Oil prices were flat on Thursday, cooling from the previous session as weak demand in the United States and broad oversupply risks countered concern over attacks in the Middle East and Russia's war in Ukraine.】

item.title: Vantage 数据中心获得 16 亿美元投资以拓展亚太地区业务
item.description: Vantage Data Centers 周四表示，该公司已获得由 GIC 关联公司和阿布扎比投资局下属单位牵头的 16 亿美元投资，用于扩大亚太地区业务，包括在马来西亚购买一个数据中心园区。【原文：Vantage Data Centers said on Thursday it has secured a $1.6 billion investment led by an affiliate of GIC and a unit of Abu Dhabi Investment Authority to scale up Asia-Pacific operations, including the purchase of a data centre campus in Malaysia.】

item.title: LB 制药公司在美国首次公开募股中筹资 2.85 亿美元
item.description: 这家生物技术公司周三表示，LB 制药公司在美国首次公开募股中筹集了 2.85 亿美元，这是自今年 2 月以来生物技术公司首次大规模公开募股。【原文：LB Pharmaceuticals raised $285 million in its U.S. initial public offering, the biotech firm said on Wednesday, marking the first sizable biotech IPO since February.】

item.title: 中国内幕中国电动汽车技术如何重塑全球汽车设计
item.description: 2021 年，当奥迪高管第一次看到 Zeekr 001（一款具有欧洲美学风格的长程电动汽车）时，就给这个德国高端汽车品牌敲响了警钟--如果想与中国汽车竞争，就需要他们的技术。【原文：When Audi executives first saw the Zeekr 001 in 2021, a long-range electric vehicle with European aesthetics, it was a wake-up call for the premium German auto brand - if it wanted to compete with the Chinese, it needed their technology.】

item.title: 美元持稳，通胀数据和央行成为焦点
item.description: 美元在周四亚洲早盘时段企稳，此前美国工厂出厂价格意外下跌，增强了美联储下周降息的预期，交易员们也在等待当天晚些时候公布的美国消费者物价数据。【原文：The dollar stabilised in early Asian trading hours on Thursday after an unexpected drop in U.S. factory-gate prices bolstered expectations the Federal Reserve will cut rates next week and traders awaited U.S. consumer price data due later in the day.】

item.title: 联合太平洋公司首席执行官维纳表示诺福克南方公司的合并将获得批准
item.description: 联合太平洋公司首席执行官吉姆-维纳（Jim Vena）周三表示，他相信该铁路运营商与诺福克南方公司（Norfolk Southern）的合并交易将获得美国政府的批准。【原文：Union Pacific CEO Jim Vena said on Wednesday he was confident that the railroad operator would receive a merger approval from the U.S. administration over its deal with Norfolk Southern .】

item.title: 阿里巴巴寻求通过可转换债券融资 32 亿美元，以增强云计算能力
item.description: 中国阿里巴巴公司周四表示，该公司正寻求通过发行零息可转换债券筹集约 32 亿美元资金，以加强其云基础设施并拓展国际业务。【原文：China's Alibaba , is looking to raise about $3.2 billion in a zero-coupon convertible note offering to strengthen its cloud infrastructure and expand its international business, the company said on Thursday.】

item.title: 据《信息报》报道，Perplexity 完成 200 亿美元估值融资
item.description: 据《信息报》周三援引知情人士的话报道，人工智能初创公司Perplexity已获得投资者2亿美元的新融资承诺，估值达200亿美元。【原文：AI startup Perplexity has secured commitments from investors for $200 million in new funding at a $20 billion valuation, the Information reported on Wednesday, citing a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 近半数日本企业认可日本央行行长的表现：路透社民意调查
item.description: 路透社周四的一项调查显示，近一半的日本企业对日本央行行长上田一夫的表现持肯定态度，超过了对其货币政策处理持负面看法的30%的企业。【原文：Almost half of Japanese companies regard Bank of Japan (BOJ) Governor Kazuo Ueda's performance positively, outpacing the 30% with negative views of his handling of monetary policy, a Reuters survey showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 官员称中国已批准进口巴西高粱，首批货物可能于 2025 年到港
item.description: 巴西农业部的一位官员告诉路透社记者，中国已经批准进口巴西高粱，并补充说第一批货物可能在今年装运，这比许多人预期的要早，为急剧下滑的美国出口提供了一个替代选择。【原文：China has approved imports of Brazilian sorghum, an official at Brazil's Agriculture Ministry told Reuters, adding that the first cargos could be shipped this year, providing an alternative to plunging U.S. exports sooner than expected by many.】

item.title: 纽蒙特公司申请自愿从多伦多证券交易所退市
item.description: 世界顶级黄金矿商纽蒙特公司周三表示，由于交易量低迷，该公司已申请其普通股从多伦多证券交易所自愿退市。【原文：Newmont has applied for a voluntary delisting of its common shares from the Toronto Stock Exchange due to low trading volumes, the world's top gold miner said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 巴西央行将于周五拍卖最多 10 亿美元的回购交易
item.description: 巴西货币管理局周三在一份声明中表示，巴西央行将于 9 月 12 日通过两次美元回购协议拍卖会发售最多 10 亿美元。【原文：The Brazilian central bank will offer up to $1 billion through two dollar auctions with repurchase agreement on September 12, the monetary authority said in a statement on Wednesday.】

item.title: 甲骨文因人工智能云计算收益而暴涨，埃里森逼近马斯克成为世界首富
item.description: 周三，甲骨文股价大涨约 43%，创下历史新高，使该公司有望加入万亿美元精英俱乐部，并使联合创始人拉里-埃里森（Larry Ellison）更接近世界富豪榜榜首。【原文：Oracle shares surged about 43% to a record high on Wednesday, putting the company on track to join the elite trillion-dollar club and propelling co-founder Larry Ellison closer to the top of the world's richest list.】

item.title: 中国打车公司滴滴出行就 2021 年 IPO 与美国投资者达成和解
item.description: 一份周三提交的法庭文件显示，中国叫车公司迪迪环球（DiDi Global）与一起集体诉讼达成和解，该诉讼称迪迪环球通过隐瞒和不服从中国政府推迟其 2021 年首次公开募股的命令，欺骗了投资者。【原文：DiDi Global , the Chinese ride-hailing company, settled a class-action lawsuit claiming it defrauded investors by concealing and disobeying a Chinese government order to postpone its 2021 initial public offering, a Wednesday court filing shows.】

item.title: 高盛首席执行官所罗门告诉 CNBC，高盛将迎来四年多来最繁忙的 IPO 周
item.description: 高盛首席执行官大卫-所罗门（David Solomon）周三在接受 CNBC 采访时表示，高盛将迎来自 2021 年 7 月以来首次公开募股最繁忙的一周。【原文：Goldman Sachs is set to see its busiest week for initial public offerings since July 2021, its CEO David Solomon said in a CNBC interview on Wednesday.】

item.title: 夏威夷航空首席执行官乔-斯普拉格将退休，戴安娜-伯基特-拉科将上任
item.description: 夏威夷航空母公司阿拉斯加航空集团周三表示，夏威夷航空首席执行官乔-斯普拉格（Joe Sprague）将于10月29日退休，由戴安娜-伯基特-拉科（Diana Birkett Rakow）接任。【原文：Hawaiian Airlines CEO Joe Sprague will retire effective October 29 and will be succeeded by Diana Birkett Rakow, the airline's parent company Alaska Air Group said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特朗普的 CFTC 候选人称企业家温克艾沃斯游说总统推迟提名
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）挑选的商品期货交易委员会（Commodity Futures Trading Commission）负责人布莱恩-昆廷兹（Brian Quintenz）周三指责加密货币企业家泰勒-温克艾沃斯（Tyler Winklevoss）在一次短信交流后游说白宫拖延对他的提名。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's pick to run the Commodity Futures Trading Commission, Brian Quintenz, on Wednesday accused crypto entrepreneur Tyler Winklevoss of lobbying the White House to stall his nomination after a text exchange.】

item.title: 交易日：通胀降温，甲骨文火力全开
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: Chipotle 将于 2026 年进军亚洲，在韩国和新加坡开设卷饼连锁店
item.description: 在美国主要市场消费者外出就餐支出减少的情况下，这家碗和卷饼生产商正努力扩大其全球业务范围。【原文：Chipotle Mexican Grill plans to foray into Asia next year by opening restaurants in South Korea and Singapore, as the bowls and burritos maker seeks to expand its global footprint amid easing consumer spending on dining out in key U.S. market.】

item.title: 便利店运营商 RaceTrac 将以 5.66 亿美元收购三明治连锁店 Potbelly
item.description: RaceTrac 周三同意以约 5.66 亿美元的价格收购三明治连锁店 Potbelly Corp，这是便利店运营商收购餐饮品牌的罕见举动。【原文：RaceTrac agreed to buy sandwich chain Potbelly Corp for approximately $566 million on Wednesday, in a rare move for a convenience store operator to buy out a restaurant brand.】

item.title: 默多克子女欢呼达成和解，结束家族信托纠纷
item.description: 普鲁登斯-麦克劳德（Prudence MacLeod）、伊丽莎白-默多克（Elisabeth Murdoch）和詹姆斯-默多克（James Murdoch）周三发表声明称，他们很高兴就默多克家族信托基金的诉讼达成和解协议。【原文：Prudence MacLeod, Elisabeth Murdoch and James Murdoch issued a statement on Wednesday saying they are happy to have reached an agreement to settle litigation over the Murdoch family trust.】

item.title: Netflix 首席产品官 Eunice Kim 将离职
item.description: 流媒体先锋 Netflix 周三表示，自 2023 年以来一直担任 Netflix 首席产品官的 Eunice Kim 将离开公司。【原文：Eunice Kim, who has been Netflix's chief product officer since 2023, will be leaving the company, the streaming pioneer said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 独家报道：消息人士称，韩国人在突袭后从更多的 LGES 美国电池基地回家
item.description: 上周，LG Energy Solution 与现代汽车（Hyundai Motor）的合资工厂遭到移民局突袭，两名熟悉情况的人士表示，由于签证问题，一些韩国工人正从 LG Energy Solution 在美国的更多生产基地成群结队地离开。【原文：Some South Korean workers are decamping in droves from more of LG Energy Solution's U.S. production sites because of visa concerns following last week's immigration raid on its joint facility with Hyundai Motor , said two people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 波音防务公司与工会达成结束圣路易斯地区罢工的临时协议
item.description: 波音公司国防部和机械工人工会周三宣布，双方已达成临时协议，结束在圣路易斯地区长达五周的罢工。【原文：Boeing Defense and the machinists union have reached a tentative deal to end a five-week-long strike in the St. Louis area, union officials announced on Wednesday.】

item.title: 拉克兰-默多克在和解后的首次发言中称信托协议对投资者大有裨益
item.description: 福克斯公司首席执行官拉克兰-默多克（Lachlan Murdoch）周三在协议签署后的首次公开讲话中表示，默多克家族信托基金的和解对 "投资者来说是个好消息"，将使公司的战略更加清晰和具有连续性。【原文：Fox Corp CEO Lachlan Murdoch said on Wednesday the settlement over the Murdoch Family Trust is "great news for investors" and will provide clarity and continuity to the company's strategy, in his first public remarks since the agreement.】

item.title: 派拉蒙任命 Meta 高管 Dane Glasgow 为首席产品官
item.description: 派拉蒙公司周三表示，Meta 公司高管戴恩-格拉斯哥（Dane Glasgow）将加入媒体公司，担任首席产品官。【原文：Paramount said on Wednesday that Meta executive Dane Glasgow will join the media company as its chief product officer.】

item.title: Cigna 称，承保减肥药物的雇主比例持平
item.description: Cigna 公司周三表示，为肥胖症药物买单的雇主比例同比持平，但该医疗保险公司仍认为对这种广受欢迎的治疗方法的需求在上升。【原文：Cigna said on Wednesday the percentage of employers paying for obesity drugs has remained flat year-over-year, though the health insurer still sees an uptick in demand for the wildly popular treatments.】

item.title: Coupang 赢得美国股东有关 IPO 的诉讼撤诉
item.description: 美国法官周三驳回了一起指控 Coupang（一家有时被称为韩国亚马逊的电子商务公司）在 2021 年首次公开募股期间和之后欺诈股东的诉讼。【原文：A U.S. judge on Wednesday dismissed a lawsuit accusing Coupang , an e-commerce company sometimes referred to as the Amazon of South Korea, of defrauding shareholders during and after its 2021 initial public offering.】
